description: Retrieves your migration and modernization preferences.

nested_items.name: applicationMode
nested_items.description: The classification for application component types.

nested_items.name: applicationPreferences
nested_items.description: The transformation preferences for non-database applications.

nested_items.name: managementPreference
nested_items.description: Application preferences that you specify to prefer managed environment.

nested_items.name: awsManagedResources
nested_items.description: Indicates interest in solutions that are managed by AWS.

nested_items.name: targetDestination
nested_items.description: The choice of application destination that you specify.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: noPreference
nested_items.description: No specific preference.

nested_items.name: targetDestination
nested_items.description: The choice of application destination that you specify.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: selfManageResources
nested_items.description: Indicates interest in managing your own resources on AWS.

nested_items.name: targetDestination
nested_items.description: Self-managed resources target destination.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: databasePreferences
nested_items.description: The transformation preferences for database applications.

nested_items.name: databaseManagementPreference
nested_items.description: Specifies whether you're interested in self-managed databases or databases managed by AWS.

nested_items.name: databaseMigrationPreference
nested_items.description: Specifies your preferred migration path.

nested_items.name: heterogeneous
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you are interested in moving from one type of database to another. For example, from SQL Server to Amazon Aurora MySQL-Compatible Edition.

nested_items.name: targetDatabaseEngine
nested_items.description: The target database engine for heterogeneous database migration preference.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: homogeneous
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you are interested in moving to the same type of database into AWS. For example, from SQL Server in your environment to SQL Server on AWS.

nested_items.name: targetDatabaseEngine
nested_items.description: The target database engine for homogeneous database migration preferences.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: noPreference
nested_items.description: Indicated that you do not prefer heterogeneous or homogeneous.

nested_items.name: targetDatabaseEngine
nested_items.description: The target database engine for database migration preference that you specify.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: prioritizeBusinessGoals
nested_items.description: The rank of business goals based on priority.

nested_items.name: businessGoals
nested_items.description: Rank of business goals based on priority.

nested_items.name: licenseCostReduction
nested_items.description: Business goal to reduce license costs.

nested_items.name: modernizeInfrastructureWithCloudNativeTechnologies
nested_items.description: Business goal to modernize infrastructure by moving to cloud native technologies.

nested_items.name: reduceOperationalOverheadWithManagedServices
nested_items.description: Business goal to reduce the operational overhead on the team by moving into managed services.

nested_items.name: speedOfMigration
nested_items.description: Business goal to achieve migration at a fast pace.
